name: autoinsert
description: Automatically inserts closing brackets and quotes. Also allows selected text to be wrapped with brackets or quotes.

name: autosave
description: Automatically saves files when they are changed.

name: autosaveonfocuslost
description: Automatically saves files that were changed when the main window loses focus by switching to another application.

name: autowrap
description: Automatically hardwraps lines when typing.

name: bigclock
description: Shows the current time and date in a view with large text (screenshot)

name: bracketmatch
description: Underlines matching pair for bracket under the caret (screenshot).

name: centerdoc
description: Centers document's content on the screen (screenshot).

name: colorpreview
description: Underlays color values (eg. #ff00ff or rgb(255, 0, 255)) with their resultant color. (screenshot).

name: copyfilelocation
description: Copy file location to clipboard.

name: datetimestamps
description: Insert date-, time- and date-time-stamps.

name: dragdropselected
description: Provides basic drag and drop of selected text (in same document).

name: eval
description: Replaces selected Lua code with its evaluated result.

name: exec
description: Runs selected text through shell command and replaces with result.

name: ghmarkdown
description: Opens a preview of the current markdown file in a browser window (screenshot).

name: gitstatus
description: Displays git branch and insert/delete count in status bar (screenshot).

name: gofmt
description: Auto-formats the current go file, adds the missing imports and the missing return cases.

name: hidelinenumbers
description: Hides the line numbers on the left of documents (screenshot).

name: hidestatus
description: Hides the status bar at the bottom of the window.

name: indentguide
description: Adds indent guides (screenshot).

name: language_angelscript
description: Syntax for the Angelscript programming language.

name: language_batch
description: Syntax for Windows Batch Files.

name: language_cmake
description: Syntax for the CMake build system language.

name: language_cpp
description: Syntax for the C++ programming language.

name: language_csharp
description: Syntax for the C# programming language.

name: language_d
description: Syntax for the D programming language.

name: language_dart
description: Syntax for the Dart programming languiage.

name: language_elixir
description: Syntax for the Elixir programming language.

name: language_elm
description: Syntax for the Elm programming language.

name: language_fe
description: Syntax for the fe programming language.

name: language_fennel
description: Syntax for the fennel programming language.

name: language_gdscript
description: Syntax for the Godot Engine's GDScript scripting language.

name: language_glsl
description: Syntax for the GLSL programming language.

name: language_go
description: Syntax for the Go programming language.

name: language_hlsl
description: Syntax for the HLSL programming language.

name: language_hs
description: Syntax for the Haskell programming language.

name: language_java
description: Syntax for the Java programming language.

name: language_jiyu
description: Syntax for the jiyu programming language.

name: language_jsx
description: Syntax for the JSX language for the React framework in JavaScript.

name: language_ksy
description: Syntax for Kaitai struct files.

name: language_liquid
description: Syntax for Liquid templating language.

name: language_make
description: Syntax for the Make build system language.

name: language_meson
description: Syntax for the Meson build system language.

name: language_moon
description: Syntax for the MoonScript scripting language.

name: language_nim
description: Syntax for the Nim programming language.

name: language_objc
description: Syntax for the Objective C programming language.

name: language_odin
description: Syntax for the Odin programming language.

name: language_perl
description: Syntax for the Perl programming language.

name: language_php
description: Syntax for the PHP programming language.

name: language_pico8
description: Syntax for Pico-8 cartridge files.

name: language_powershell
description: Syntax for PowerShell scripting language.

name: language_psql
description: Syntax for the postgresql database access language.

name: language_rust
description: Syntax for the Rust programming language.

name: language_ruby
description: Syntax for the Ruby programming language.

name: language_sass
description: Syntax for the Sass CSS preprocessor.

name: language_sh
description: Syntax for shell scripting language.

name: language_teal
description: Syntax for the Teal programming language, a typed dialect of Lua..

name: language_tex
description: Syntax for the LaTeX typesetting language.

name: language_v
description: Syntax for the V programming language.

name: language_wren
description: Syntax for the Wren programming language.

name: language_zig
description: Syntax for the Zig programming language.

name: lfautoinsert
description: Automatically inserts indentation and closing bracket/text after newline.

name: linecopypaste
description: Copy, cut and paste the current line when nothing is selected.

name: lineguide
description: Displays a line-guide at the line limit offset (screenshot).

name: macmodkeys
description: Remaps mac modkeys command/option to ctrl/alt.

name: markers
description: Add markers to docs and jump between them quickly (screenshot).

name: memoryusage
description: Show memory usage in the status view.

name: motiontrail
description: Adds a motion-trail to the caret (screenshot).

name: openfilelocation
description: Opens the parent directory of the current file in the file manager.

name: openselected
description: Opens the selected filename or url.

name: rainbowparen
description: Show nesting of parentheses with rainbow colours.

name: restoretabs
description: Keep a list of recently closed tabs, and restore the tab in order on cntrl+shift+t.

name: scale
description: Provides support for dynamically adjusting the scale of the code font / UI (ctrl+-, ctrl+=).

name: scalestatus
description: Displays current scale (zoom) in status view (depends on scale plugin).

name: selectionhighlight
description: Highlights regions of code that match the current selection (screenshot).

name: sort
description: Sorts selected lines alphabetically.

name: spellcheck
description: Underlines misspelt words (screenshot) — note: on Windows a words.txt dictionary file must be placed beside the exe.

name: tabnumbers
description: Displays tab numbers from 1–9 next to their names (screenshot).

name: themeselect
description: Select a theme based on filename of active document.

name: titleize
description: Titleizes selected string (hello world => Hello World).

name: togglesnakecamel
description: Toggles symbols between snake_case and camelCase.

name: unboundedscroll
description: Allows scrolling outside the bounds of a document.
